name: Thai Beef Satay
recipeIngredient: 1 lb (500g) beef steak sliced into very thin strips or diced into  3/4" cubes,
recipeInstructions: 2. Pour the marinade over and stir well to combine. Allow at least 1 hour for marinating, or longer (up to 24 hours).
3. When ready to cook, thread meat onto the skewers. Tip: Fill up to 3/4 of the skewer; leaving the lower half empty so the person grilling has a "handle" to easily turn the satay.

4. Cook on an outdoor grill, basting the first time you time it with a little of the leftover marinade from the bottom of the bowl. Turn the satay every 5 to 6 minutes until done to your liking (15 to 25 minutes).
